嗹字的基本解释

嗹
lián
助词，旧时歌曲中的衬字，犹今日“呀呼嗨”之类。
〔嗹喽〕说话啰嗦。
丹麦王国的旧译名。

嗹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》落賢切，平先，來。］
(1)见“嗹嘍”。
(2)国名。丹麦王国的旧译名。

嗹字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嗹； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页204第21
【集韻】陵延切，音連。【玉篇】嗹嘍，多言也。【集韻】本作謰。

嗹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嗹字的起名意思

暂无。

chitchat
Basic explanation of words
chitchat
lián
Auxiliary words, the words used in old songs, are like "ahhhhh" today.
〔嗹喽〕Talking is long-winded.
The old translated name of the Kingdom of Denmark.
chitchat
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" falls to Xianqie, level first, come. ]
(1) See "嗹喽".
(2) Country name. The old translated name of the Kingdom of Denmark.
chitchat
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嗹; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 204-21
【Ji Yun】Ling Yan cuts, the sound is connected. [Jade articles] Whoosh, talk more. [Ji Yun] This is a 謰.
